protocol.text: Plants were grown either in the absence of iron or in the presence of 100uM Fe.
10-day-old plants grown on 0.5X MS plates without or with (100 micromolar) iron.
Qiagen RNAeasy extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on ATH1 Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
The data were analyzed using simpleAffy from Bioconductor and RMA normalization.
